title: Research and Education 2015
text: 173243 Research and Education 2015 TRB’s   Record: Journal of the   Board, No. 2480 consists of 8 papers exploring research and education in the transportation industry, including: Fair Representation of   Record Impacts: Case Study on Journal Citation Reports’ Impact Factor Developing a Framework for Financial Achievability of Department of   and Development Projects Opportunities for Enhancing Construction Education and Student Internships with Multimedia Tools Motivating Students to Pursue Transportation Careers: Implementation of Service-Learning Project on Transit Inverted Classroom and Its Influence on Students’ Attitudes Across Learning Styles Transportation Engineering Instructional Practices: Analytic Review of the Literature Multiagent Route Choice Game for Transportation Engineering TRB Publication Type:   Records   9/28/2015
